forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High 19C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High around 65F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. W winds shifting to ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 43F. WSW winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. WNW winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. WNW winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday
